text.en:
Summary

Congratulations! Your score of **92/100** for Spring 2025 confirms the excellent air quality in your UXCO Student common areas. üí® With an average temperature of **24.8¬∞C**, your comfort is guaranteed, even during warmer periods.

Observed Performances

Your main spaces show top-notch air quality. The **Dining Area - Ground Floor** is in 'Optimal' mode with a **confinement index of 0/5**. Your **Fitness - Ground Floor** also performs very well, rated **1/5 ('Very Good')**, which is ideal for your workout sessions.
We also observe excellent overall averages for humidity (approx. **57%**) and PM2.5 microparticles (approx. **0.3 ¬µg/m¬≥**) across all spaces.

Identified Points of Attention

Some CO‚ÇÇ peaks were detected, particularly during high attendance times in the sports areas. The **Fitness Cours collectifs RDC** area shows a confinement index of **2/5 ('Attention')** with peaks reaching up to **2587 ppm**. The **Fitness - Ground Floor** also reached a peak of **2450 ppm**. These moments are temporary and reflect a high concentration of the community during intense activity.

Impact on Your Well-being

‚Ä¢ More **energy** and **concentration** thanks to well-oxygenated air. 
‚Ä¢ Reduced risk of **virus** and **bacteria** transmission due to good ventilation.
‚Ä¢ A **more pleasant atmosphere** for your relaxation and meal times.
‚Ä¢ Potentially better **sleep** quality as your body is not exposed to confined air.

Recommendations

To maximize air quality, especially during classes and peak times at the Fitness room (around 8-9 PM on Mondays and Fridays), remember to **open the windows** when possible. The **Dining Area - Ground Floor** is very well ventilated all week, making it the perfect spot for your work sessions or casual meals! üí¨
